description: Officers seize a car abandoned in Bush Street, Middlesbrough, and find gas cannisters inside.
title: Middlesbrough driver seen inhaling gas flees from police
title_page: Middlesbrough driver seen inhaling gas flees from police - BBC News
maintext:
A driver who was seen inhaling gas from a balloon while at the wheel of a car is being hunted by police.
Officers spotted the black Ford Kuga in Linthorpe Road, Middlesbrough, at about 15:00 GMT on Saturday.
Cleveland Police said the suspect evaded officers and fled the scene, abandoning the car in Bush Street.
The force said it was trying to identify the driver and had seized the vehicle, inside which they found a number of gas canisters.
